trans-unit.source: Defines constants that inform <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren*> about how it should validate a container's child controls.
trans-unit.target: Define constantes que informam <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren*>sobre como ele deve validar controles filho do contêiner.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren*>

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A> will validate all enabled controls in a container, such as a form.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A>validará habilitados todos os controles em um contêiner, como um formulário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this enumeration to restrict the types of controls whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Use esta enumeração para restringir os tipos de controles cujo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>

trans-unit.source: You can combine these enumerated values together with a bitwise OR operation.
trans-unit.target: Você pode combinar esses valores enumerados junto com uma operação OR bit a bit.

trans-unit.source: Combining parameters with a bitwise OR operator will result in a logical AND operation.
trans-unit.target: Combinação de parâmetros com um operador OR bit a bit resultará em uma operação AND lógica.

trans-unit.source: For example, calling `ValidateChildren(ValidationConstraints.ImmediateChildren | ValidationConstraints.Enabled)` will only raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> event on controls that are both immediate children of the container AND are enabled.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, chamar `ValidateChildren(ValidationConstraints.ImmediateChildren | ValidationConstraints.Enabled)` gerará somente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>evento em controles que são filhos imediatos do contêiner e estão habilitados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify ImmediateChildren when you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A>, the method will require that you validate all child controls in the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Se você não especificar ImmediateChildren ao chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A>, o método exigirá que você valide todos os controles filho na hierarquia do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ValidateChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Validates child controls whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Valida controles filho cujo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled*>está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Validates child controls that are directly hosted within the container.
trans-unit.target: Valida controles filho que são hospedados diretamente dentro do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: Does not validate any of the children of these children.
trans-unit.target: Não validar qualquer um dos filhos desses filhos.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> that contains a custom <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UserControl"></xref>, and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UserControl"></xref> contains a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"></xref>, using ImmediateChildren will cause the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UserControl"></xref> to occur, but not the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você tiver um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> que contém um personalizado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UserControl"> </xref>e o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UserControl"> </xref> contém um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"> </xref>, uso ImmediateChildren fará com que o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating"> </xref> eventos do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UserControl"> </xref> ocorrer, mas não o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating"> </xref> eventos do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Button"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Validates all child controls, and all children of these child controls, regardless of their property settings.
trans-unit.target: Valida todos os controles filhos e todos os filhos desses controles filho, independentemente de suas definições de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Validates child controls that can be selected.
trans-unit.target: Valida controles filho que podem ser selecionados.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Validates child controls that have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*> value set, which means that the user can navigate to the control using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: Valida controles filho que têm um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*>valor definido, o que significa que o usuário pode navegar para o controle usando a tecla TAB.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Validates child controls whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Valida controles filho cujo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*>está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
